result.ga: is neacha básmhara muid go léir
result.orig: is neacha básmhara muid go léir
result.html: is neacha básmhara muid go léirWe are all mortal creatures.
result.ponchtml: is neaċa básṁara muid go léirWe are all mortal creatures.

result.eng: They would often be in mortal danger.
